ctx: assert (forall i : nat, i < n -> P i \/ ~ P i) as H0.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (bounded_min P H0 n) as [H1 | H1].
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop n : nat H, H0 : forall i : nat, i < n -> P i \\/ ~ P i The term "H0" has type "forall i : nat, i < n -> P i \\/ ~ P i" while it is expected to have type "forall x : nat, P x \\/ ~ P x" (cannot unify "i < n -> P i \\/ ~ P i" and "P i \\/ ~ P i").

original: intros H. assert (forall i : nat, i < n -> P i \/ ~ P i) as H0. - apply H. - pose proof (bounded_min P H0 n) as [H1 | H1]. + left. apply H1. + right. destruct H1 as [i [H2 [H3 H4]]]. exists i. auto.
